autoRules.notes: Pick a comp that can survive silences...

bosses.name: Baphomet
bosses.summary: High sustain boss with defensive stance and energy-drain mechanics.
bosses.strategyNotes: Prioritize Energy Regen on supports to counter pentacle drain. During defensive stance, save ultimates and focus on non-ult damage to drain boss energy faster. Keep supports close to DPS to cleanse silence debuff immediately.
mechanics: Targets top DPS: grants ATK SPD but silences + self-damage

skills.name: Abyssal Sin Retribution
skills.description: Baphomet enters a defensive stance, reducing DMG taken by 66.6% and dealing DMG equal to 66.6% of ATK per sec to all targets. Energy is not deducted right away; instead loses 66.6% Energy when taking non-Ultimate DMG. Ends when Energy is depleted.

skills.name: Abyssal Annihilation Rush
skills.description: Upon entering, lays down a pentacle, increasing ATK SPD of all units and dealing % max HP damage + draining Energy every 3s. Boosts the pentacle every 25s (stacks up to 3).

skills.name: Corrupt Gift of Silence
skills.description: Infuses demonic power into the unit currently dealing the highest DMG. Target gains ATK SPD, but takes DMG per sec and is silenced for 10s.

recommendedComps.label: Max Damage (Meta)
recommendedComps.reason: High sustained DPS with strong energy/cooldown support to keep rotations running under energy-drain pressure.
notes: Keep main DPS protected during silence windows
Energy support is key vs pentacle drain

recommendedComps.label: Safer / More Stable
recommendedComps.reason: More defensive stability if your DPS gets punished by silence/self-damage.

autoRules.notes: Pick a comp that can survive silences on top DPS + sustain through ramping aura.

bosses.name: Demonic Horse
bosses.summary: Burst-damage boss with charge + frontal pressure, scaling via Berserk on HP loss.
bosses.strategyNotes: Position tank to absorb charge attacks. Spread formation to minimize frontal flame damage. Burst DPS early before Berserk scaling ramps up. Control/stun during charge windup to interrupt.
mechanics: Berserk: losing HP increases DEF and ATK

skills.name: Haunting Nightmare
skills.description: Summons a spectral horse to charge through all enemies dealing massive DMG.

skills.name: Soulflame
skills.description: Breathes flames, dealing massive DMG to enemies ahead.

skills.name: Berserk
skills.description: Losing HP increases DEF and ATK.

recommendedComps.label: Max Damage (Auto)
recommendedComps.reason: Prioritizes high PvE score while keeping enough sustain to survive charge + frontal pressure.

autoRules.notes: Aim for fast rotations + consistent DPS; keep baseline sustain for charge windows.

recommendedComps.label: Safer / Stable (Auto)
recommendedComps.reason: More survivability against charge bursts and frontal damage patterns.

autoRules.notes: Shield/heal coverage helps stabilize against burst patterns; Energy keeps support loops running.

bosses.name: Epica
bosses.summary: Control-heavy boss: repeated random-target damage + long root cage with knockback, scaling via Berserk.
bosses.strategyNotes: Cleanse support essential to remove root debuffs. Shield/heal random targets during channel windows. Position backline carefully to avoid knockback disruption. Fast burst to prevent Berserk scaling.
mechanics: Repeated random-target damage over time (8s channel)
Roots a random enemy for 10s + knocks back nearby units
Berserk: losing HP increases DEF and ATK

skills.name: Death Blossom
skills.description: Epica summons souls, dealing DMG equal to 40% of ATK to 2 random enemies every 0.5s for 8s.

skills.name: Resentment Cage
skills.description: Roots a random enemy for 10s and knocks back all units around it. Deals DMG equal to 100% of ATK per sec to the rooted unit.
mechanics: High single-target DoT on rooted unit

skills.name: Berserk
skills.description: Losing HP increases DEF and ATK.

recommendedComps.label: Max Damage (Auto)
recommendedComps.reason: Optimized for PvE score/rotations while tolerating random-target pressure.

autoRules.notes: Energy+Cooldown helps maintain ult cycles; AoE helps keep overall output high during channels.

recommendedComps.label: Safer / Stable (Auto)
recommendedComps.reason: Counters random-target damage + long root windows with sustain/cleanse coverage.

autoRules.notes: Random-target pressure + root cages punish squishy DPS; sustain layers reduce wipes and keep damage uptime.

bosses.name: Isthar VI
bosses.summary: Barrier-based boss that punishes teams outside the umbrella and swings fights with knockback and large battlefield-wide bursts.
bosses.strategyNotes: Stay inside umbrella barrier for full damage output. Shield heroes critical to block knockback and AoE bursts. Time ultimates during burst windows when umbrella protection is active. Single-target DPS vastly preferred over AoE heroes.
mechanics: Umbrella barrier: units outside deal 80% less damage
Knockback pulse; shielded units are immune
Battlefield-wide bursts; shields can negate damage
Massive AoE burst with ATK SPD/Move SPD slow; reduced damage inside umbrella

skills.name: Divine Canopy
skills.description: Opens a giant umbrella barrier at combat start. Units outside the barrier deal 80% less DMG to Isthar.

skills.name: Divine Banishment
skills.description: Knocks back surrounding enemies. Units with a shield are immune to knockback.

skills.name: Goblet of Libation
skills.description: Casts Sacred Downpour on all units, dealing burst DMG to all targets. Enemies with a shield can negate the DMG by losing their shield.

skills.name: Sacred Ablution
skills.description: Casts Sacred Ablution on all units, dealing massive DMG and reducing ATK SPD & Move SPD. Units inside the giant umbrella barrier take reduced DMG.

recommendedComps.label: Max Damage (Auto)
recommendedComps.reason: Prioritizes strong PvE output while valuing shields to counter knockback and burst damage.

autoRules.notes: Shields mitigate knockback and absorb burst windows; Energy/Cooldown keeps rotations online.

recommendedComps.label: Safer / Stable (Auto)
recommendedComps.reason: Adds extra sustain and shield coverage to survive repeated battlefield-wide bursts.

autoRules.notes: Shield/heal coverage reduces wipe risk during umbrella and burst phases.
